item.title: Wordle: A Telegram Bot Game in Go
item.description: Introduction Being mainly a Java programmer, I decided however to expand my area of knowledge and the fates fell on the Go language. And the best way to learn is to apply, to practice what you learn! I usually prefer to do this by implementing a game or a tool that has some use. So this time it’s a game - Wordle, but implemented as a Telegram Bot. Environment To run Go code, you need to install Go on your local computer.
